room_title: Escape room "Trophy Hunters" by Junkyard Escape in Lincoln
review: We had so much fun in the Trophy Room! Challenging puzzles but very clever! Definitely one to check out!

room_title: Escape room "Trophy Hunters" by Junkyard Escape in Lincoln
review: Fun for the whole group! Kids were 7-12 and all helped out!

room_title: Escape room "Trophy Hunters" by Junkyard Escape in Lincoln
review: This was our first time trying an escape room and we had a blast! We chose the trophy hunt puzzle as we were bringing our kids. They loved the experience and it was great family time. We will absolutely be back with friends to try the other one.
